content:
I need to add a new resource to the various compartments, but when I try to open compartments.xml in Excel, I get an error:
XML ERROR in Worksheet Setting
REASON: Bad Value
GROUP: Worksheet
TAG: Table
ATTRIB: ExpandedRowCount
VALUE: 146

I've tried in two different Excel programs. Can anyone else verify?
yup, it is messed up. Still a valid xml, so just edit using an xml editor
okay thx, just wanted to make sure that it wasn't just me. :)
I have two branches... my compartments.xml from 6/19 is okay so the damage was done sometime since then
okay, fixed it. Someone added a row probably in XML mode and didn't update the worksheet row count setting.
wow.. love that excel tool... hope that something better comes along

yeah, why would you have an attribute telling you the number of rows when you can just count the rows. especially if you are going to throw an "i give up I can't do anything" error if the attribute doesn't match the actual number of rows?!?
